title: Unwind at this Stylish Hotel in the Heart of Kuta
description: Stay in one of Bali’s prime locations at Sol House Bali Kuta. Moments away from the best surf beaches, restaurants and shopping precincts, this sleek and modern hotel will have everything you’re looking for. Make this your ultimate Bali getaway with complimentary buffet breakfast, a la carte dinners of Indonesian and international cuisine, welcome cocktails by the pool and access to wellness spa and fully-equipped gym.
offer_address: Jl. Bakung Sari No.81, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Kuta Tropical Escape with Daily Breakfast, Two Lunches or Dinners & Beach Club Entry
description:
Step into the heart of vibrant Kuta with a stay at Harper Kuta Bali. The hotel's prime location places you in the midst of Kuta's bustling nightlife, with its myriad of bars, clubs and restaurants. Immerse yourself in the local culture with a visit to the nearby Legian Art Market or explore the stunning Kuta Beach, famous for its spectacular sunsets and surfing.

Inside the hotel, you'll find a tranquil sanctuary away from the lively streets. Savour the flavours of Indonesia at the onsite Rustik Bistro & Bar, or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. For those seeking a bit of pampering, the hotel's spa offers a range of treatments designed to rejuvenate and relax.
offer_address: Jln Legian No.73, Kuta, Badung Regency 80361, Bali

title: Contemporary Bali Bliss with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Aryaduta Bali is the ultimate escape in Bali’s most vibrant beach resort town, minutes from trendy restaurants, bars and the sands of South Kuta Beach. Stylish and modern, Aryaduta Bali is perfect for those looking to succumb to Bali's unparalled serenity, with diverse dining options and a rooftop infinity pool and bar where you can enjoy nightly drinks with views of the glistening ocean. With an escape to this contemporary haven, all you'll have to think about is lazing by the pool, making it on time to the hotel’s nightly free-flow happy hour and taking the kids to one of Kuta’s exhilarating waterparks.

For a touch of local culture, bustling Seminyak is just a short ride away, while the stylish Lippo Mall Kuta sits adjacent, ensuring you're never too far away from all of Bali's action.
offer_address: Jl. Kartika Plaza Lingkungan Segara, Kuta, Bali, 80361, Indonesia

title: Ultra-Spacious South Kuta Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Find yourself hidden away in Bali’s most vibrant beach resort town, but just minutes from the trendy restaurants, bars and the sands of South Kuta Beach. Stylish and modern, Aryaduta Bali is perfect for those looking to succumb to Bali’s unparalleled serenity, with a rooftop infinity pool and bar where you can enjoy views of the glistening ocean.

Escape to this contemporary haven and fill your days lazing by the pool, staying satiated thanks to two diverse dining options, soaking up the hotel’s nightly free-flow cocktail hour and splashing into the pools at Waterbom Bali with the kids.

For a touch of local culture, bustling Legian is just a short ride away, while the stylish Lippo Mall Kuta sits adjacent, ensuring you’re never too far from Bali’s vibrancy and action.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Secluded Bali Beachfront Suites with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Daily Cocktails
description:
Experience one of Bali's most exquisite hidden sanctuaries with an escape to The ANVAYA Beach Resort Bali - a cocoon of tranquillity where tropical elegance and traditional Balinese style emanates from every corner. This peaceful oasis offers the pinnacle of relaxation and seclusion, while only a short walk from Bali's famed beaches, fantastic shopping precincts, bustling restaurants and local eateries within easy reach.

While young ones will enjoy splashing in the glistening swimming pools, building sandcastles on the private sands, or learning the best of Balinese culture at The ANVAYA Kids Club, adults can indulge in poolside cocktails or a rejuvenating massage at the serene Sakanti Spa. Bali bliss doesn't get any better than this, as the whole family will love the age-appropriate and enriching activities available to book, including watersports, cultural dinners, and yoga classes (charges apply).
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Tuban, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Sunny Bali Getaway with Daily Rooftop Drinks
description: Stay in one of Bali’s most popular areas at J4 Hotels Legian, located within walking distance of restaurants, bars, shops and beaches. Soak up the sun as you enjoy daily buffet breakfast, two two-course dinners, return airport transfers, a daily beer each at the rooftop pool bar and more.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Legian 74 Br. Pengabetan Kuta, 80361 Bali 80361 Indonesia

title: Kuta Contemporary Family-Friendly Resort with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails plus Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Experience the buzz of Kuta’s vibrant restaurant scene and nightlife with a stay at Aryaduta Bali, a stylish hotel in the heart of South Kuta with the area’s famous bars, restaurants, beaches and waterparks all at its doorstep. Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide by Tripadvisor, Aryaduta Bali offers the perfect high-end escape in the heart of the action. 

The hotel's facilities are second-to-none, with a breathtaking rooftop infinity pool overlooking the Indian Ocean, and a swanky pool bar serving up refreshing cocktails, ice-cold beers and snacks. Work out at the state-of-the-art gym, grab a bite to eat at Henry’s Grill & Bar and take a short walk to the beach. Perfect for couples and families alike, Aryaduta Bali is ideally located a short drive from bustling Seminyak and adjacent to the stylish Lippo Mall Kuta, which features a Cinemaxx theatre showing the latest movies in air-conditioned comfort. Not only that but Waterbom waterpark, Circus Waterpark Kuta, Discovery Shopping Mall and Segara Beach are all within easy reach.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Kuta Beachfront Stay with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Beach Club Entry
description:
Embrace the eclectic spirit of Bali with a stay at this beachfront oasis, ideally placed just steps from the golden shores of Kuta Beach. Overlooking the Indian Ocean, this vibrant sanctuary blends contemporary design with ocean-inspired interiors. Think chic furnishings, comfortable rooms and amenities, all designed to offer the perfect tropical retreat.

Soak up panoramic vistas from one of two infinity pools, and cool off with refreshing cocktails from the Surf Pool Bar. When hunger strikes, tuck into local and international delicacies at Riva Bar & Restaurant, designed like a cruise ship, or head to Waves for a hearty meal. After a day of exploring the local area, return to your hotel for a soothing treatment at Aqua Spa.
location_description: The Kuta Beach Heritage Hotel Bali, Managed by Accor
offer_address: Jl Pantai Kuta Br Pande Mas Kuta Badung, Kuta, Bali 80361

title: Kuta Beachfront Luxury with Beach Wing Upgrade, Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Kuta's best hotel awaits: discover family-friendly five-star bliss at this tropical oasis, magnificently positioned on Bali's golden shores. Consistently crowned Tripadvisor's #1 hotel in Kuta, it's easy to see why this beachside gem is the pinnacle of relaxed seclusion - and with access to the resort's coveted Beach Wing, those closest to the oceanfront, you'll be perfectly placed to savour it.

The hotel boasts five spectacular outdoor pools, sprawling lush green gardens,  multiple onsite dining options plating favourites from Indonesia and beyond, as well as the world-class Sakanti Spa, all just moments away from vibrant shopping precincts, bustling restaurants, local eateries and one of Bali's most legendary sunset-facing beaches.

The ANVAYA Beach Resort Bali perfectly balances family-friendly fun with opulence fit for the Island of the Gods. Kids will enjoy splashing in the pools, building sandcastles on the private beach or learning about Balinese culture at ANVAYA Kids' Club. Meanwhile, adults can indulge in poolside cocktails or a blissful massage at the serene spa.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Tuban, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Stay in Rock-Star Style Just Steps from Kuta Beach with Gourmet & Family Friendly Inclusions
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Hard Rock with a family friendly escape to tropical Kuta, staying just steps from the beach at Hard Rock Hotel Bali. Whether you’re looking to chill out or rock out, you’ll have everything you need at this award-winning resort, which comes complete with Bali’s largest hotel swimming pool fringed with cabanas, a recording studio and much more. Enjoy a fun-filled escape for two adults and two kids 11 and under, with daily breakfast, two buffet dinners, one lunch at celebrity chef eatery, Jamie’s Italian, relaxing massages and cocktails for the adults, a karaoke session, access to one of Bali’s best kids’ clubs and much, much more.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta, Banjar Pande Mas, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Luxury Escapes First: Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Kids Eat Free
description: Do Not Use
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Kuta, Kuta, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Suite Escape
description: Head to the heart of Kuta and enjoy the brand-new suites at Ramayana Suites - an urban sanctuary close to the white sands of famed Kuta and Segara Beach. Fusing Balinese culture and modern-day comforts with the natural surrounds, enjoy a seven or nine-night escape with daily breakfast, two decadent three-course dinners, nightly cocktail each, 60-minute blissful couples’ massage, return airport transfers, guaranteed late 1pm checkout and more.
offer_address: Jl. Bakung Sari, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Bali Escape with Nightly Cocktails
description:
Head to the heart of Kuta and savour the outstanding service and relaxing atmosphere at Ramayana Suites - a sanctuary close to the white sands of Kuta and Segara Beach. Fusing Balinese culture and modern-day comforts with the natural Balinese surrounds, enjoy a seven or nine-night escape with daily breakfast, two nightly cocktails each, one decadent three-course dinner, 60-minute blissful couples’ massage, return airport transfers, guaranteed late 1pm checkout and more.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Jl. Bakung Sari, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Brand-New Ultra-Cool Bali Kuta Beach Retreat with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast & Free-Flow Drink Hour
description:
Be among the first to discover unique, design-driven luxury with a stylish stay at Tribe Bali Kuta Beach, a brand-new beachside retreat perfectly framed by showstopping views of the shimmering Indian Ocean. This calypso-cool, social club-inspired Kuta stay has everything you need for an unforgettable escape - innovative, sustainability-focused design is effortlessly woven with cutting-edge technology to guarantee a stay that’s steeped in sophistication and comfort, all just moments from the golden shores of one of Bali's best beaches.

After days spent soaking up Kuta Beach’s legendary sun, surf and sand, return to the hotel’s rooftop for laidback bites and beanbag sessions at Afterglow Bar & Kitchen or admire each spectacular sunset by the stunning infinity pool. When you’re ready to explore, Kuta is a traveller’s playground offering countless adventures - you’ll be just moments away from the boutique-filled open-air gardens of Beachwalk Shopping Centre, countless eclectic treasures at Kuta and Legian Art Markets and the Bali Sea Turtle Society. On your return, you'll be warmly met by Tribe Bali Kuta Beach's top-notch service and a wealth of spaces designed to decompress and delight.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta No. 99, Kuta, Legian 80361 Badung, Bali, Indonesia

title: Contemporary Bali Oasis in Kuta with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Immerse yourself in the tropical allure of Aryaduta Bali, a stylish sanctuary nestled in the heart of vibrant Kuta. Indulge in home-style grills and Indonesian delights at the bustling Henry's Grill & Bar, then ascend to the Rooftop Pool Bar for cocktails against a backdrop of shimmering ocean vistas. Beyond the hotel, Kuta's thrilling waterparks beckon, while the chic district of Seminyak is a short drive away. For retail therapy, the upscale Lippo Mall Kuta is conveniently adjacent, placing you at the heart of Bali's dynamic pulse.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Beachfront Indulgence in the Heart of Kuta
description: Experience a Bali holiday to remember with eight nights in a Deluxe Pool View Room at the fully-refurbished Grand Inna Kuta, perfectly positioned just steps away from the beach and minutes from Kuta's vibrant streets. Includes daily breakfast, three dinners, one nightly drink per person, one 60-minute massage each, early check-in and late check-out, and return airport transfers from Bali Denpasar Airport. Plus two kids aged 11 years and under stay for free!
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Kuta No. 1, 80361 Kuta, Indonesia

title: Bali Hard Rock Family Escape with Kids' Club Access, Daily Dining & Airport Transfers
description:
Dive into the biggest pool in Bali on an the ultimate family escape to Hard Rock Hotel, a fun-filled, rock 'n' roll resort just steps from the famous Kuta beach. Whether you’re looking to chill out or rock out, big and little kids alike will have everything they need for an incredible stay at this award-winning resort jam-packed with entertainment.

Kids under 12 will love Roxity Kids' Club, a colourful adult-free haven of dance and play, while teens will be happy hanging out at the TABU Teens' Club, complete with private cinema, PS4, Xbox and more. While the young ones are playing games and making friends, adults can unwind in the luxurious Rock Spa or Rock Gym whirlpool, or float over to the swim-up bar for a well-deserved cocktail or two at the Shack. Plus, the whole family can experience Bali’s largest hotel swimming pool: fringed with luxe cabanas, this aquatic oasis is complete with waterpark, slides and a sandy island for sunbathing. After a big day of adventure, retreat to your super-stylish Deluxe room - perfect for a family of four.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta, Banjar Pande Mas, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Family-Friendly Hard Rock Bali Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Drinks & Nightly Dinner
description:
Make a splash in the famed Hard Rock Hotel Bali, home to what's renowned as Bali's largest free-form swimming pool and ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor. This rock 'n' roll resort enjoys a spectacular location in the heart of Kuta, Bali's thriving beach town. Soak up the sun on the Balinese shores just steps away from the hotel or stay onsite and enjoy the fabulous facilities that create a perfect escape for families with endless entertainment to delight both the young and the young at heart.

Adults can relax in a poolside cabana or unwind in the Rock Spa while children (4-12) play games and make new friends in Roxity Kids Club or splash around in the Kids Waterpark. Fitness enthusiasts should visit Body Rock gym, an innovative fitness facility featuring a sauna, steam rooms and hot and cold plunge pools. Meanwhile, teens can hang out in the ultra-cool TABU Teens Club (13-17), complete with air hockey, pool table, PS4 and more. A visit to Jamie Oliver Kitchen promises delicious bites worthy of the popular chef and his family, while Splash Bistro allows you to dine poolside before taking a dip in the refreshing waters of the massive main pool.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta, Banjar Pande Mas, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Newly Opened: Discover Aryaduta Bali in Iconic Kuta with Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description: Discover the brand new Aryaduta Bali: a contemporary hotel in the heart of South Kuta, with the area’s famous bars, restaurants, beaches and water parks all close by. Includes return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfast, delicious dining experiences including a BBQ and buffet rooftop dinner, nightly free-flow beers and cocktails, a leisurely late 3pm checkout and more. Plus, two kids aged 11 years and under stay and play for free - with two daily breakfast and two dinners included.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Kuta's Top-Rated Bali Beachfront Escape with Guaranteed Upgrade, Gourmet Dining & Nightly Sunset Cocktails
description:
Experience five-star bliss at The ANVAYA Beach Resort Bali, Tripadvisor's top hotel in Kuta. This peaceful oasis is the pinnacle of relaxation and seclusion, boasting five stunning outdoor pools and multiple onsite dining options serving both traditional and western delights, all only moments away from fantastic shopping precincts, bustling restaurants, local eateries and the golden sands of Bali's famed beaches.

With a guaranteed upgrade to the hotel's Beach Wing, enjoy an opulent stay as the young ones enjoy splashing in the glistening swimming pools, building sandcastles on the private beach, or learning the best of Balinese culture at the ANVAYA Kids' Club. Meanwhile, adults can indulge in poolside cocktails or a rejuvenating massage at the serene Sakanti Spa. Bali bliss doesn't get any better than this: the whole family will love the array of enriching activities, including watersports, cultural dinners and yoga classes (charges apply).
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Tuban, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Bali Escape in Heart of Kuta with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
If you're looking for an urban sanctuary with contemporary accommodation and first-class facilities, then Ramayana Suites & Resort is just the ticket. Ranked among Tripadvisor’s top 10% of properties worldwide, this five-star retreat is home intimate suites, each emanating traditional elegance and modern-day comforts in natural Balinese surrounds.

Perfectly poised within walking distance to Kuta's shopping districts, local attractions, nightlife, and dining hotspots, the resort offers the utmost in unrivalled luxury and tranquility in the heart of Kuta. While leaving the tropical oasis of your suite is optional, there are plenty of reasons to explore. Be led down the path to wellbeing at the spa, where specialised treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques to melt away tension. Celebrate high-quality ingredients and global influences at Gabah Indonesian Cuisine restaurant and as day turns into evening, the Pool Bar offers handcrafted cocktails to cheers your escape.
offer_address: Jl. Bakung Sari, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Discover Contemporary Luxury with Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description: Discover high-end Aryaduta Bali: a contemporary hotel in the heart of South Kuta, with the area’s famous bars, restaurants, beaches and water parks all close by. Opened just last year, you'll experience a high-end getaway including a private one-way airport transfer, daily buffet breakfast, delicious dining experiences including a three-course dinner and a romantic rooftop dining experience, nightly free-flow beers and cocktails, a leisurely late 3pm checkout and more. Plus, two kids aged 11 years and under stay free.
offer_address: Jalan Kartika Plaza, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Stylish Kuta Beachfront Escape with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Discover unique, design-driven luxury with a stylish Kuta Beach stay framed by showstopping views of the shimmering Indian Ocean. This calypso-cool, social club-inspired stay - which is part of the renowned AccorHotels - has everything you need for an unforgettable escape, all just moments from the golden shores of one of Bali’s best beaches.

After days spent soaking up Kuta Beach’s legendary sun, surf and sand, return to the hotel’s rooftop for laidback bites and beanbag sessions at Afterglow Bar & Kitchen, or admire each spectacular sunset by the stunning infinity pool.

When you’re ready to explore, Kuta is a traveller’s playground offering countless adventures - you’ll be just moments away from the boutique-filled open-air gardens of Beachwalk Shopping Centre, and countless eclectic treasures at Kuta and Legian Art Markets.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta No. 99, Kuta, Legian 80361 Badung, Bali, Indonesia

title: Bali Getaway near Kuta Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Beers & Rooftop Pool
description:
Settle into the inviting ambience at this calm retreat just steps away from Bali's best shoreline. Start your mornings with a hearty breakfast at the open-air Taste Restaurant, which also offers lunch and dinner options featuring Western favourites and traditional Asian dishes. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Langit Bar & Lounge, offering stunning sea views and an infinity pool surrounded by tropical gardens.

Located a five-minute walk from Kuta Beach, this hotel sits at the crossroads of sand, surf and local life. Catch Bali's legendary sunsets at nearby rooftop bars, or take a short drive to discover the restaurants and markets of Poppies Lane. For those seeking Bali's nightlife scene, the popular Sky Garden Bali and other entertainment venues are just around the corner.
offer_address: Jalan Benesari, Pantai Kuta, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Modern Bali Retreat in the Heart of Kuta with Daily Breakfast & Daily Choice of Lunch or Dinner
description:
Bask in the contemporary cool of this hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of Kuta and a stone's throw from the lively beach scene, markets and a tempting array of local eateries. Delight in the hotel's three swimming pools, indulge in a pamper session at the spa and work up a sweat at the gym, or relax and unwind in the comfort of your room.

When hunger strikes, savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at HARRIS Café and sip refreshing drinks at HARRIS Pool Bar as you soak in tropical vibes. Splash around in the sea and explore the exciting nightlife of the Legian and Kuta beaches nearby. Kids will find entertainment at the onsite Dino Kids' Club - making this stay perfect for some family-friendly fun.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Kuta 62A, Kuta, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tropical Kuta Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Embrace the vibrant energy of Kuta at this retreat, just moments from Kuta Beach and vibrant markets. This serene oasis has a peaceful outdoor pool invites you to soak up the balmy Bali days. Fuel up for your adventures and sample delicious bites at Serani Restaurant and get ready to see where the day takes you. 

This hotel is your gateway to exploring Kuta. Venture to explore nearby attractions like Waterbom Bali waterpark or immerse yourself in the island's rich cultural heritage. For those seeking retail therapy, Mal Bali Galeria is just a stone's throw away and offers the ultimate shopping experience.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Kuta No.98, Kuta, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

description:
Embrace the energy of Kuta from this central retreat, just steps from Kuta Beach. Cool off with a swim in the outdoor pool, enjoy all-day dining at Lagenda Restaurant or kick back with a daily beer. Unwind further with included massages at the spa, and enjoy complimentary access to popular beach clubs like Tropical Temptation, Canna and Café del Mar.

Step outside and dive into the best of Bali right at your doorstep - explore bustling local markets, lively nightlife and eateries along Jalan Legian. Be sure to take a day trip to the sacred Uluwatu Temple, perched dramatically on a cliff overlooking the dazzling Indian Ocean.

description:
Soak up the sun-drenched allure of Bali's popular Kuta Beach from this design-forward luxury stay, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Indian Ocean. Blending effortless Balinese charm with a social club-inspired atmosphere, the hotel's chic interiors, plush rooms and lavish amenities ensure an unforgettable escape, mere steps from Kuta's golden sands.

Spend your days indulging in Kuta's iconic sun, surf and sand, explore colourful markets and sample street food at nearby warungs. Return to your hotel's rooftop to enjoy a refreshing dip in the infinity pool and catch epic beach sunsets, all while savouring laidback bites and sipping on well-crafted cocktails at Afterglow Bar & Kitchen.

title: Kuta Beachfront Indulgence with Two Restaurants, Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
Embrace the eclectic spirit of Bali with a stay at this stylish beachfront oasis, ideally placed mere steps from the golden shores of Kuta Beach. Overlooking the Indian Ocean, this vibrant sanctuary blends contemporary design with ocean-inspired interiors. Think chic furnishings, plush rooms and world-class amenities, all designed to offer the perfect tropical retreat.

Soak up panoramic vistas from one of two infinity pools, and cool off with refreshing cocktails from the Surf Pool Bar. When hunger strikes, tuck into local and international delicacies at Riva Bar & Restaurant, designed like a cruise ship, or head to Waves for a hearty meal. After a day of exploring the local area, return to your hotel for a soothing treatment at Aqua Spa.
offer_address: Jl Pantai Kuta Br Pande Mas, Kuta Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali's First-Ever Beachfront Resort by Ovolo with Rooftop Bar & Pool
description:
If it’s a Bali escape that you have been dreaming about, there is just one name you need to know - Mamaka by Ovolo - a stylish urban resort right in the beating heart of Kuta Legian. Drop your bags and arrive at this ultra-cool, beachside haven complete with all the cutting-edge Ovolo touches you would expect from this renowned collection of hotels. As the very first Ovolo property in Bali, Mamaka by Ovolo raises the bar with its suite of incredible offerings sure to wow guests. It all starts with maximalist décor that packs a punch as geometric patterns grace the walls and cool blue hues reflect the beachside environment. Then, there are the exquisite facilities including a stylish wellness centre where guests can sweat it out with included boot camp or yoga classes, freshen up your party shirt at the self-service 24-hour laundry or plunge into the rooftop pool, located at Mamaka Rooftop Bar & Pool, that runs parallel to the ocean. When hunger strikes, pull up a seat at Street 32, a vibrant split-level restaurant slinging classic Asian dishes with a modern spin.

When you want to delve into the history and culture of this incredible island, visit the Uluwatu Temple or, for a change of scenery, the magical rainforest and terraced rice paddies of Ubud, both of which are within an hours’ drive.
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Kuta No.32, Legian, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Family-Friendly Hard Rock Bali Five-Star Escape
description:
Dive headfirst into the ultimate family escape at the recently renovated Hard Rock Hotel Bali, a fun-filled, eco-friendly rock 'n' roll resort, just steps from famous Kuta Beach, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor and certified by the Global Sustainable Tourism Council (GSTC). 

Whether you’re looking to chill out or rock out, big and little kids alike have everything they need for an incredible stay, jam-packed with entertainment. Adults can relax in a poolside cabana or unwind in the Rock Spa, while the kids play games and make new friends at Roxity Kids' Club (for ages 4-12) or splash around in the waterpark.

Fitness enthusiasts can work out at Body Rock Gym or try out the five-metre rock climbing wall, while teens can hang out in the ultra-cool TABU venue, complete with a multipurpose DJ booth, pool table, and PlayStation 4. Venture into Kuta for buzzing bars and restaurants, surf or sunbathe at Kuta Beach, or treat the family to a fun day out at Waterbom Bali, an action-packed water park with rides and dining options.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta, Banjar Pande Mas, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
